Rx BC Email.description:
Mandatory field. This field must always be populated(cannot be null or blank).
Primary Key /Identity used for profile stitching in AEP.

Rx BC First Name.description: Mandatory field. This field must always be populated(cannot be null or blank).

Rx BC Last Name.description: Mandatory field. This field must always be populated(cannot be null or blank).

Rx BC Email.description: Mandatory field. This field must always be populated(cannot be null or blank).

Rx BC Email Template Info.description: Mandatory field. This field must always be populated(cannot be null or blank).

Rx BC Event ID.description: Mandatory field. This field must always be populated(cannot be null or blank).

Rx BC Event Type.description: Mandatory field. This field must always be populated(cannot be null or blank).

Rx BC New User Registration Link.description: This field can either be populated or be null/ blank.

Rx BC Timestamp.description:
Mandatory field. This field must always be populated(cannot be null or blank).
Make sure timestamp format is accepted in AEP.

Rx BC User Group.description: Mandatory field. This field must always be populated(cannot be null or blank).
